text:
Hello, how can I pass the Arraylist object from broadcastIntent.putExtra to my activity? 
I have Arraylist as, ` List<Geotrigger> passedGeotriggers = new ArrayList<Geotrigger>();` I want to send these triggered geotriggers to my activity from my service.
Geotrigger should be a Parcelable, then you can transform an array of Parcelable between Activities.

I wanted to clean up my Dagger code a bit and I was wondering if anyone knows any good repos with good practices on number of Components. For example I see some using only one component, others going with AppComponent -> SpecificScreenComponent and others with AppComponent -> ActivityComponent -> SpecificScreenComponent
I am going with the second way for now but I do see the benefits of having an intermediate Activity/FragmentComponent where I provide common "screen" functionality like Picasso
Was looking for something similar couple of days ago.. but they are hard to find.
Found the documentation on `@subcomponent` abit hard to understand :thinking_face:
<@U09T8SFG8> <https://github.com/frogermcs/GithubClient> if you haven’t seen it allready.

attachments.title: frogermcs/GithubClient
attachments.text: GithubClient - Example of Github API client implemented on top of Dagger 2 DI framework.
